Title: Glenfarne, PTT sign cooperation deal, initial offtake of 2 mtpa of LNG from Alaska LNG
Description: Glenfarne Alaska LNG and Thailand’s PTT have signed a cooperation agreement for strategic participation in the proposed 20 mtpa Alaska LNG project in Nikiski.
Author: JS

Title: LNG Canada produces first LNG
Description: The Shell-led 14 mtpa LNG Canada export project in British Columbia has produced its first LNG and maintains its goal to ship its maiden cargo mid-year.
Author: JS

Title: Freeport LNG requests more time to finish Train 4
Description: Freeport LNG has filed a request with the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) to grant a 40-month extension to construct its Train 4 project, citing setbacks from the June 2022 explosion and the long recovery process as the main reasons.
Author: JS

Title: Golar LNG, Kosmos Energy confirm commercial start of Greater Tortue Ahmeyim FLNG
Description: Floating LNG unit player Golar LNG and energy company Kosmos Energy have announced the start of commercial operations of the 2.5 mtpa Greater Tortue Ahmeyim (GTA) FLNG project offshore Senegal and Mauritania, amid the project loading its fourth cargo.
Author: JS

Title: Petronas, Jogmec sign cooperation deal to explore bilateral LNG arrangements
Description: PETRONAS LNG and Japan Organisation for Metals and Energy Security (Jogmec) have signed a memorandum of cooperation (MoC) to expand the collaboration framework in the LNG sector, through a strategic arrangement.
Author: JS

Title: Woodside signs initial LNG supply deal with Jera for winter season
Description: Woodside Energy Trading Singapore has signed a non-binding heads of agreement (HoA) with Jera for the supply of LNG during Japan’s peak winter period in 2027.
Author: JS
